description.value:
Trigger A creature moves into the room beyond the northern stairs

Effect The blood on the floor bubbles vigorously, and as the bubbles burst, waves of toxic gas vent up around the triggering creature. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30] save unless they are holding their breath or don't need to breathe; the hazard then rolls initiative.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} by the foul smelling gas.

Failure As success, but the creature also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} by the poison gas.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2}.

details.description: A churning pool of blood bubbles and seethes, periodically venting noxious vapors into the air.
details.disable: Three @Check[type:nature|dc:33] or @Check[type:occultism|dc:33] checks to draw from the blood its magical nature, causing it to clot and become inert, a @Check[type:religion|dc:36] check to offer prayers to sever the sacred link to Kabriri, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] (6th rank; counteract DC 29) to render the hazard inert for 10 minutes
details.reset: The hazard settles back down 1 round after all creatures leave the room and can trigger again at the start of the next round.
details.routine: (2 actions) The bubbles furiously sputter and burst on the hazard's first action, filling the air with toxic vapor that inflicts @Damage[6d6[poison]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:30|basic:true] save) to all creatures in area J3b. A creature that's holding its breath gains a +4 circumstance bonus to this save. On the hazard's second action, the bubbles Vent Toxins at a random target in area J3b.
